item.name: ðŸ‘¥ Role Management

body.raw:
{
  "name": "content_manager",
  "displayName": "Content Manager",
  "description": "Can manage content but not users",
  "permissions": [
    "content:read",
    "content:create",
    "content:update",
    "content:delete",
    "content:publish",
    "profile:read",
    "profile:update"
  ]
}

{
  "displayName": "Senior Content Manager",
  "description": "Can manage all content and some user operations",
  "permissions": [
    "content:read",
    "content:create",
    "content:update",
    "content:delete",
    "content:publish",
    "users:read",
    "profile:read",
    "profile:update"
  ]
}
